mapper.select: select vpn_code, vpn_name, eff_date, exp_date, state, vpn_type, vpn_number from tif_vpn_group where vpn_code = #{vpnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into tif_vpn_group
vpn_code,
vpn_name,
eff_date,
exp_date,
state,
vpn_type,
vpn_number,
